attributes.action: Green Britain  introduction of working from home - now that most things are remotley accessible (5 day week 2 days off to be capped) 4 days at work 3 days for rest !
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Time for radical new changes.. 
A few changes are required.

1. Green Britain
To reduce polution/congestion make it more compulsary for IT people to work from home.  (since most IT people will get to work to connect to remote machines)

2. Ever increasing Taxes.
By changing the way working britain works we can have a better balance, 

2.1 introduce 7 day week work but 4 days per week per person with 3 days off for weekend - this generates new jobs.
